paper_abstract: In [6] a connection among rough sets (in particular, pre-rough algebras) and three-valued Lukasiewicz logic L-3 is pointed out. In this paper we present a temporal like semantics for Nilpotent Minimum. logic NM [22,17], in which the logic of every instant is given by L-3: a completeness theorem will be shown. This is the prosecution of the work initiated in [5] and [1], in which the authors construct a temporal semantics for the many-valued logics of Godel [24,14] and Basic Logic [27]. (C) 2013 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A temporal semantics for Nilpotent Minimum logic
